      </FIELD>

columnTypes.name: coord_dec
columnTypes.description: Fiducial ICRS Declination of centroid used for database indexing

columnTypes.name: coord_ra
columnTypes.description: Fiducial ICRS Right Ascension of centroid used for database indexing

columnTypes.name: deblend_nChild
columnTypes.description: Number of children this object has (defaults to 0)

columnTypes.name: deblend_skipped
columnTypes.description: Deblender skipped this source

columnTypes.name: detect_fromBlend
columnTypes.description: This source is deblended from a parent with more than one child.

columnTypes.name: detect_isDeblendedModelSource
columnTypes.description: True if source has no children and is in the inner region of a coadd patch and is in the inner region of a coadd tract and is not a sky source and is a deblended child

columnTypes.name: detect_isDeblendedSource
columnTypes.description: True if source has no children and is in the inner region of a coadd patch and is in the inner region of a coadd tract and is not a sky source and is either an unblended isolated source or a deblended child from a parent with

columnTypes.name: detect_isIsolated
columnTypes.description: This source is not a part of a blend.

columnTypes.name: detect_isPatchInner
columnTypes.description: True if source is in the inner region of a coadd patch

columnTypes.name: detect_isPrimary
columnTypes.description: True if source has no children and is in the inner region of a coadd patch and is in the inner region of a coadd tract and is not a sky source

columnTypes.name: detect_isTractInner
columnTypes.description: True if source is in the inner region of a coadd tract

columnTypes.name: footprintArea
columnTypes.description: Number of pixels in the source's detection footprint. Reference band.
